name: Tank Match
description:
Tank match is a simple arcade game where no special actions are required, only attentiveness. Your task is to knock down as many cubes flying from above as possible and earn a lot of points.

HOW TO PLAY

To play, you only need a computer mouse and keyboard:

• LMB (left mouse button) - shoot

• RMB (right mouse button) - swap the charges in the gun

• R / MMB (middle mouse button) - recharge the gun

Shoot the dice with balls of the same color. The value shows how many times you need to hit it. If you hit a different color, the value will increase and there will be a penalty value that will not be added to the points.

If there is no desired color, reload the gun or swap the balls on the PCM.

For convenience, you can use only the mouse buttons in the game.

Good luck to get the best result!
